value:
$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I realize this is sudden, but...$k$pThere is something I must do... And
I can only do it when we're alone.$k$pIt's something that is not easy for
me to do. I am...reluctant.$k$pYou see...it's something my mother
commanded me to do.$k$p$EFace|Mother needs you to die.$k$pDon't struggle. We both know there
would be no point.$k$p$EFace_Pain|Truly, I regret this. You were all so
kind to me. So very kind...$k$pFarewell, $Nu...$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo2000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Is it done?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Yes, Mother. Just as you ordered.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Excellent. Now there is none left
capable of resisting me.$k$pYour services are no longer required,
Eir. I will now claim what remains
of your life.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Mother, please... Fulfill your promise
to me, at least...$k$pYou swore to reveal the secret of
my dreams...$k$pWhy do I dimly remember us,
winged in white?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|That is not me you have seen.
That is your birth mother.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I don't understand...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Your true parents were royalty,
blessed by the dragon of life.$k$pI slaughtered them, when you were
young, and claimed you for myself.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Then I erased your memory, and led
you to believe you were my daughter.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Why...would you do such a thing?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|To make you compliant. There is
nothing a child trusts more than
a mother.$k$pYou were happy to obey me, even as
I fed upon your life, again and again.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$pYou...deceived me...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|Yes. There is little reason to dwell on
it now, however, considering your life
is at its end.$k$p$Sbs3000|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|She has more time than you realize.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|You!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|How did you get here, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|It was you, wasn't it, Eir? But how?$k$pI carved my will into your very being.
It's impossible for you to disobey me!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It must be difficult for the ruler of
the dead to understand those who
still have beating hearts.$k$pEir trusted us with everything.$k$pOur summoner was never in danger
of falling prey to your plans!$k$pThe power to defeat you remains
very much alive.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘル,ch00_19_Hell_F_Normal,Face|That is just the trouble with life,
Alfonse... It can so easily be lost.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hel's vanished. Has she retreated?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Mother...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Eir, are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I am...fine. Yes... Perhaps for the first
time, I am all right.$k$p
